name: Battle Music Full Mod
description: Music Battle Full Mod is a rhythmical game where you need to press arrows to dance and battle different antagonists. The game has the following characters: Tabi EX, Garcello, Tricky, Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Nearest, Monster, and Spirit. Besides them, we have some guest characters like Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman, and Whitty, ...
